name: Untitled Goose Game
overview: Untitled Goose Game is a slapstick-stealth-sandbox, where you are a goose let loose on an unsuspecting village. Make your way around town, from peoples' back gardens to the high street shops to the village green, setting up pranks, stealing hats, honking a lot, and generally ruining everyone’s day. Key Features: • A horrible goose (that's you) • A town full of people just trying to get on with their day (you hate them) • A dedicated honk button (!!!)
